headline: Will Murata (TSE:6981) Leverage Its Cadence Integration to Deepen Its Electronics Market Advantage?
summary: Cadence Design Systems announced a major collaboration with Murata Manufacturing, making Murata's inductor and capacitor libraries directly accessible within Cadence's top Electronic Design Automation tools. This direct integration is expected to streamline circuit design processes and could encourage engineers to use Murata's components more frequently in their projects. We’ll explore how direct integration with Cadence’s EDA tools could strengthen Murata’s competitive positioning in the...

headline: Streamlining Project Efficiency with Murata’s Pre-Installed Electrical Models in the Latest Versions of Cadence OrCAD X Capture™, Allegro X System Capture™ and AWR Design Environment™ (Microwave Office)
summary: KYOTO, Japan, October 21, 2025--Murata announces a significant collaboration with Cadence, making product libraries directly accessible within Cadence’s leading EDA tools.
